body_html:
I tried building PyTorch 0.3.1 on Windows 10, Cuda 9.1 using peterjc's repo + build batch script. Everything worked without a hitch.

Now I'm trying to use autograd profiler to get some profiling info but when I do a print, the system just hangs…

Here’s what I’m doing

with torch.autograd.profiler.profile(True, False) as prof:
my code to run forward pass
print(prof)
Has anyone tried using PyTorch profiling API on windows?

body:
I tried building PyTorch 0.3.1 on Windows 10, Cuda 9.1 using peterjc's repo + build batch script. Everything worked without a hitch. 

Now I'm trying to use autograd profiler to get some profiling info but when I do a print, the system just hangs…

Here’s what I’m doing

with torch.autograd.profiler.profile(True, False) as prof:
   my code to run forward pass
print(prof)
Has anyone tried using PyTorch profiling API on windows?
